pages.text: If a toolgun mode uses positions do so something, it will have "HitPos Modes". Depending on chosen mode, it will determine how position will be calculated$(li)$(l)Normal$() - No transformation, uses raw position$(li)$(l)Centered On Side$() - Will use center of a block face it hit.$(li)$(l)Centered In Block$() - Will use center of a block it hit.$(li)$(l)Precise Placement$() - Will create n (uses "Precise Placement Side Points") squared points on a block face, and use closest to hit point.
pages.title: HitPos Modes
